summary: 1)  WHEN ACCELERATING FROM S STOP,  MY CAR WILL JERK  (LIKE THE TRANSMISSION         IS SLIPPING). IT WILL OFTEN JERK WHILE MY CAR IS IN MOTION AS WELL.  THIS HAPPENS ON CITY STREETS & FREEWAYS/HIGHWAYS.   2)  THERE IS ALSO AN ISSUE WITH THE "HOOD LATCH" NOT LOCKING COMPLETELY. IT         SOMETIMES  LOOKS LIKE THE HOOD IS GOING TO POP OPEN WHEN DRIVING .
